VisaSwitzerland VisaBeaches near PuneAuthorNigileshUpdated DateFebruary 28, 2025Read7 minutes The beauty that prevails in Pune and the beaches near Pune has a lot to do with preserving the beauty of the city and holding its reputation among nature lovers and adventure freaks. The pristine beaches have to be told to each of its guests in numerous stories; whether it’s a foreigner or a native. The colourful shades that appear in blue, white, green and more give a boundless charisma to those beaches. The luxurious shores filled with tall trees and the evergreen combination of blue water and white sandy shores play a major role in creating a romantic atmosphere around the beaches and inviting the soft-hearted to melt away once deeply and the strong-hearted to find themselves unknowingly rejuvenated. You do have the choice of selecting some adventurous or leisurely activities such as sailing, snorkelling, scuba diving, cruising, fishing, jet-skiing, lying on the sandy bed and relaxing for the whole day. 12 Best Beaches Near Pune 1. Tarkarli Beach Tarkarli beachSource: Google Images Popular for the mesmerising beauty it holds, Tarkarli Beach is known for its long, narrow stretch maritime coastline. It gives you one of the most relaxing experiences and may blissfully make your sunsets. You ‘re sure to rejuvenate in this highly placid beach destination, just a few miles from Pune, in the calm and serene atmosphere! Distance from Pune: 388 Kilometers (approx) Also Read: Honeymoon destinations near Mumbai 2. Alibag Beach One of Pune’s most famous weekend getaways, Alibag is a hub for habitants of Mumbaikars and Pune. Not only the beach, but there are also a number of things to visit and sightsee here too. One of Alibag’s famous tourist spots is the Kulaba Fort which can only be visited in the gap between the high and the low tide. Besides this, the beautiful beach also has placed such as Magnetic Observatory, Kanhoji Angre Samadhi, Vikram Vinayak Temple and St. Barbara Tower making it an incredible tourist destination close to Pune. Distance from Pune: 143 Kilometers (approx.) 3. Mandwa Beach Mandwa beach Source: Google Images Mandwa village has its own charm, with its striking coconut palm groves. This is the ride that will take you to Mandwa Beach, the spell bounding! Relax, take a day off and head to this famous destination which has plenty of sightseeing spots ready for you. You can also enjoy a stunning view over the sea, up to India’s Gateway, on a clear day. Distance from Pune: 150 Kilometers (approx.) 4. Ganpatipule Beach This serene coastline beauty, called the Ganpatipule Beach, stretches alongside the calm and sedate village of Ganpatipule. Located on the Konkan coast, this seashore is home to a variety of cuisines and breathtaking scenery. Getting there doesn’t take much, and is surely one of India’s best beaches; you ‘re definitely going to leave this place with a relaxed, sober mind. Distance from Pune: 316 Kilometers (approx.) Also read: Places To Visit In Vagamon 5. Murud Beach Murud beachSource: Google Images Delve into this small coastal serenity called Murud Beach. A quiet getaway on the Konkan coastline, with its gorgeous beach and lush greenery, will delight you. Take a tour through this place, reside in nature’s tranquilly as you feel the blue waters and the soft sands winding your feet through. Distance from Pune: 159 Kilometers (approx.) 6. Kashid Beach Located at a stone’s throw from Pune, Kashid Beach is considered to be a perfect one-day trip destination among all the other near Pune beaches. Surrounded by lush greenery and soothing scenic beauty, this beach is a perfect destination for a family getaway. The sea is a little wild with high tides in the afternoon, but it’s a relaxing evening experience. Distance from Pune: 172 Kilometers (approx.) Also Read: Places To Visit In Khandala When You Visit Maharashtra 7. Diveagar Beach A drive to this place alongside the amazing coastline is not only for the kick of being at a beach spot; you can also visit the ‘Suvarna Ganpati’ and spend a whole day paying deference to Lord Ganesh. This place is also a home for stunning landscapes and surreal sands, as well as being popular with the Ganesh temple; all these things make it the list of best beaches near Pune! Distance from Pune: 163 Kilometers (approx.) 8. Harihareshwar Beach Harihareshwar beachSource: Google Images Smooth winds, soft sands and inviting waters make Harihareshwar Beach one of the most popular beaches near Pune, making it the most desirable for tourists. If you’re one of those who love seafood there’s no dearth here for you! You will enjoy the seaside, relax with your peeps at Harihareshwar and have an unforgettable weekend. You can also take a cruise if you want to explore further, and sway on the blue waters of this beautiful coast! In addition, one can also find out to visit several more thrilling and beautiful hill stations near Pune, along with family and friends. Distance from Pune: 174 Kilometers (approx.) 9. Harne Beach Drive to one of the least explored beaches in Pune; Harne Beach will certainly be on top of your list while you are thinking about this! Get a little closer to the natural beauty of nature and feel quietness at this placid destination. A perfect getaway that will make you spellbound with its untouched natural beauty and make you visit more near Pune beaches. Distance from Pune: 186 Kilometers (approx.) 10. Kunkeshwar Beach Popularly known as’ South India Kashi’- Kunkeshwar temple stands majestically on the sands of Maharashtra’s Kunkeshwar beach. A ‘one-day-getaway’ destination that has in store for you both a temple visit and a relaxing beach. The pristine beach’s white sands add more elegance to the temple on this coast. May it be for the temple or the calming seashore, surely all the tourists will visit this place near Pune! Distance from Pune: 366 Kilometers (approx.) 11. Dapoli Beach Near to Pune, there may be a variety of beaches you can visit but nothing like Dapoli Beach. Just a few hours’ drive from Pune and Mumbai, a clean, virgin beach without crowds! Sounds a little too good to be true? Yes, this is true! A drive through the beautiful scenery will in no time put you at this place. Activities such as Dolphin Watching and Beach Volleyball will make this trip one of Pune ‘s best weekend getaway. Distance from Pune: 201 Kilometers (approx.) 12. Dahanu Bordi Beach A 17 Km stretch in Thane, Maharashtra that will surely fascinate you with amazing landscapes and beautiful coastline. It is a quiet seaside town with a sprawling, unbeatable beach that will make it perfect for a ‘one-day visit!’ ‘Depart from your busy schedule and rejuvenate at this relaxing Maharashtra beach spot. Also, along with your family and friends, enjoy many more things happening in Pune. Distance from Pune: 294 Kilometers (approx.) Can’t wait to plan your next Kerala vacation with us?
